english.segment1: People count on "nothing isn't worth it". Enslave your bodies for money to buy freedom
english.segment2: The people are angry with you and each other. I will remember when you said you'd save me
english.segment3: You disappoint your fathers and your mothers. With your faith not lasting I wonder what you'll wonder. And soon you'll sing badabadabadada. And soon you'll sing badabadabadada
english.segment4: The people are angry with you and each other. But I will remember when you said you'd save me. Badabadabadada
english.segment5: The people are angry with you and each other
